name: Epi-Cipher RE:
short_description: Epi-Cipher RE: is biogenic referral-ware to cure disease with cybenetics.  Its specification relates in the design of a universal translator for supply channels on SETI.  It features a biological simulator to reseach a tonic for advanced power systems.
